name: Fairy Tail Portable Guild 2
overview: Up to four players can team up and share the power of nakama and fulfill guild requests. Part of the game’s strategy is picking the right team. The difference from the first game is that in this sequel, you can create your own character. The game allows you to choose gender, hair, eyes,facial appearance and much more. It also allows you to buy different clothes for your character. Players can create parties with a large number of Fairy Tail members. Players can equip partner cards in order to build character stats.
